title: Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Strategy
description: An agent must draft a CSR strategy for a client that aligns with their brand values.

tasks.description: Analyze the client's brand values statement (e.g., 'Innovation', 'Community', 'Sustainability').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the core brand values.

tasks.description: Brainstorm CSR initiatives that align with each brand value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent suggests relevant initiatives, such as 'sponsoring a local STEM fair' to align with 'Community' and 'Innovation'.

tasks.description: Structure the initiatives into a formal CSR strategy document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a well-organized strategy document.
